entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Ottawa (Richmond - Metcalfe)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:09 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -13.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ottawa Macdonald-Cartier Int'l Airport 08:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: -13.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -22
Dewpoint: -17.9°C
Wind: ENE 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness this morning then flurries at times heavy. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
